properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 8 at 1:38PM CST until February 9 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
...Period of Moderate to Heavy Snow Sunday...

* WHAT...A period of moderate to heavy snow with rates of 1 inch
or more per hour possible for a short time during the mid
morning to early afternoon. Total snow accumulation of 2 to 4
inches.

* WHERE...Winnebago and Boone Counties.

* WHEN...Highest impact, heaviest snowfall is expected to develop
between 8 and 10 am and last for 2 to 4 hours before tapering
off and then possibly changing to some light rain or drizzle.

* IMPACTS...High snow rates will likely lead to roads becoming
snow covered for a time and travel hazardous.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS....
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the
internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com. The latest road
conditions for Indiana are available by calling 18002617623.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 4 PM CST SUNDAY
